project_name.justification: The primary project of interest is stated as Tombstone, and the article is titled 'Aztec Expands Tombstone JV Patented Land Position in Arizona by Acquiring the Historic High-Grade Silver-Gold Westside Mine'.

company_name.justification: The buying company is identified in the first paragraph: 'Aztec Minerals Corp. (TSX-V:AZT)(OTCQB:AZZTF) and Dragoon Resources LLC ("Tombstone JV Partner") announce the acquisition...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO is identified beneath his quote: '"Simon Dyakowski" Simon Dyakowski, Chief Executive Officer Aztec Minerals Corp.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction was for a full claim, which was 'purchased outright'. The text states: 'Aztec and Dragoon have acquired the Westside patented claim from a third-party... The patented claim was purchased outright and has no underlying royalties or work commitments.'

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata specifies 'Au' as the primary commodity. The article title also confirms this: '...Acquiring the Historic High-Grade Silver-Gold Westside Mine'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is directly about the Tombstone project, as indicated by the title and content.

currency.justification: The currency is explicitly mentioned as US dollars: '...for cash consideration of US$65,000.'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The cash payment amount is stated in the text: 'Aztec and Dragoon have acquired the Westside patented claim from a third-party for cash consideration of US$65,000.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction was for cash only; no share payments were mentioned.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: An explicit cash payment value was found, so this field is null per the data extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of this transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued, so there is no associated share price for the transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text explicitly states there are no work commitments: 'The patented claim was purchased outright and has no underlying royalties or work commitments.'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text explicitly states there are no royalties associated with the acquired claim: 'The patented claim was purchased outright and has no underlying royalties or work commitments.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The area of the acquired claim is specified: '...acquisition of one patented claim (private property rights) amounting to 7.82 hectares (19.33 acres)...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the acquired area is specified: '...amounting to 7.82 hectares (19.33 acres)...'

resource_size.justification: The article mentions historical production and exploration potential ('potential bulk-tonnage carbonate replacement deposit') but does not provide a current, quantified mineral resource estimate.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph: 'Aztec Minerals Corp. (TSX-V:AZT)(OTCQB:AZZTF)'.
